mapper.select: SELECT def_vip_fsendsms.id, def_vip_fsendsms.sms_code, def_vip_fsendsms.send_type, def_vip_fsendsms.send_scope, def_vip_fsendsms.sms_vips, def_vip_fsendsms.vip_group_code, def_vip_fsendsms.content, def_vip_fsendsms.corp_code, def_vip_fsendsms.modified_date, def_vip_fsendsms.modifier, def_vip_fsendsms.created_date, def_vip_fsendsms.creater, def_vip_fsendsms.isactive, def_corp.corp_name FROM def_vip_fsendsms,def_corp WHERE def_vip_fsendsms.corp_code = def_corp.corp_code AND def_vip_fsendsms.ID=#{id}

SELECT def_vip_fsendsms.id, def_vip_fsendsms.sms_code, def_vip_fsendsms.send_type, def_vip_fsendsms.send_scope, def_vip_fsendsms.sms_vips, def_vip_fsendsms.vip_group_code, def_vip_fsendsms.content, def_vip_fsendsms.corp_code, def_vip_fsendsms.modified_date, def_vip_fsendsms.modifier, def_vip_fsendsms.created_date, def_vip_fsendsms.creater, def_vip_fsendsms.isactive, def_corp.corp_name FROM def_vip_fsendsms,def_corp WHERE def_vip_fsendsms.corp_code = def_corp.corp_code
AND def_vip_fsendsms.corp_code = #{corp_code}
AND (def_vip_fsendsms.sms_code LIKE concat('%',#{search_value},'%') OR def_vip_fsendsms.content LIKE concat('%',#{search_value},'%') OR def_corp.corp_name LIKE concat('%',#{search_value},'%') OR def_vip_fsendsms.creater LIKE concat('%',#{search_value},'%') OR def_vip_fsendsms.created_date LIKE concat('%',#{search_value},'%') )
ORDER BY def_vip_fsendsms.id DESC
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO def_vip_fsendsms
sms_code,
send_type,
send_scope,
sms_vips,
vip_group_code,
content,
corp_code,
modified_date,
modifier,
created_date,
creater,
isactive,
activity_vip_code,

#{isactive},
#{activity_vip_code},
mapper.select: SELECT def_vip_fsendsms.id, def_vip_fsendsms.sms_code, def_vip_fsendsms.send_type, def_vip_fsendsms.send_scope, def_vip_fsendsms.sms_vips, def_vip_fsendsms.vip_group_code, def_vip_fsendsms.content, def_vip_fsendsms.corp_code, def_vip_fsendsms.modified_date, def_vip_fsendsms.modifier, def_vip_fsendsms.created_date, def_vip_fsendsms.creater, def_vip_fsendsms.isactive FROM def_vip_fsendsms WHERE def_vip_fsendsms.corp_code = #{corp_code} AND def_vip_fsendsms.sms_code= #{sms_code}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM def_vip_fsendsms WHERE corp_code =#{corp_code} AND activity_vip_code =#{activity_vip_code}
mapper.select: SELECT def_vip_fsendsms.id, def_vip_fsendsms.sms_code, def_vip_fsendsms.send_type, def_vip_fsendsms.send_scope, def_vip_fsendsms.send_time, def_vip_fsendsms.sms_vips, def_vip_fsendsms.vip_group_code, def_vip_fsendsms.content, def_vip_fsendsms.corp_code, def_vip_fsendsms.modified_date, def_vip_fsendsms.modifier, def_vip_fsendsms.created_date, def_vip_fsendsms.creater, def_vip_fsendsms.activity_vip_code, def_vip_fsendsms.isactive FROM def_vip_fsendsms WHERE def_vip_fsendsms.CORP_CODE = #{corp_code} AND def_vip_fsendsms.activity_vip_code= #{activity_vip_code}
